pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multi-Gene Descent Probabilities // Do multi-gene descent probabilities (Thompson, 1983, doi:10.1098/rspb.1983.0072) and special cases thereof (Thompson, 1986, doi:10.1002/zoo.1430050210) including inbreeding and kinship coefficients. But does much more: probabilities of any set of genes descending from any other set of genes.
